data.title: Up, down, up, down...
data.statement:
Output the input text with alternating upper and lowercase characters.
Characters in even position should be uppercase and odd position should be lowercase.
Non-alphabetic characters will not be modified and will be output as well.

testCases.title: 2 text lines
testCases.testIn:
2
This is Peter.
He is a programmer!
testCases.testOut:
ThIs iS PeTeR.
He iS A PrOgRaMmEr!

testCases.title: 3 text lines
testCases.testIn:
3
Can you solve this?
Show how good you are!
Here is a line with a number.
testCases.testOut:
CaN YoU SoLvE ThIs?
ShOw hOw gOoD YoU ArE!
HeRe iS A LiNe wItH A NuMbEr.

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn:
4
Big and small, this is the challenge.
Tick tock, on the clock.
Time is running out.
555555555555555
testCases.testOut:
BiG AnD SmAlL, tHiS Is tHe cHaLlEnGe.
TiCk tOcK, oN ThE ClOcK.
TiMe iS RuNnInG OuT.
555555555555555

testCases.title: 4 text lines
testCases.testIn:
4
pRoGrAmMiNg iS ThE BeSt!
cOdInGaMe iS FuN!
mOrE AnD MoRe tExT LiNeS.
iS ThIs tHe eNd?
testCases.testOut:
PrOgRaMmInG Is tHe bEsT!
CoDiNgAmE Is fUn!
MoRe aNd mOrE TeXt lInEs.
Is tHiS ThE EnD?

testCases.testIn:
10

fffFFFffFF?
ggGGGG5ggGG6ggGGG.

Cc cCcCc
DdDdDdDd!
EeEeE EeEeE-
FfFfFfFfFf?
GgGgGg5gGgG6GgGgG.

data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
loop N read ROW:string(1024)
write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[N]] for the number of text lines.
<<Next [[N]] lines:>> Text lines
data.outputDescription: <<[[N]] lines:>> The input text with alternating upper and lowercase characters

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Output the input text with alternating upper and lowercase characters.
Characters in even position should be uppercase and odd position should be lowercase.
Non-alphabetic characters will not be modified and will be output as well.
Input
Line 1: An integer N for the number of text lines.
Next N lines: Text lines
Output
N lines: The input text with alternating upper and lowercase characters
Constraints
1 ≤ N ≤ 100
Example
Input
1
Hello World!
Output
HeLlO WoRlD!
